src:
Dogovor z Morsom propadel
07 Nov 2019, 06:03 by Veronika Rupnik Ženko

Župan Igor Marentič je sporni predlog novega začasnega dogovora z ministrstvom za obrambo glede osrednjega vojaškega vadišča umaknil z dnevnega reda včerajšnje seje občinskega sveta. Da takšnega dogovora, ki bi občini sicer prinesel 250.000 evrov, a bi bil širše gledano zanjo škodljiv, ne bodo podprli,...



Foto: Daniel Cek

POSTOJNA > Predlog novega dogovora, ki ga je z občino pripravila pogajalska skupina Morsa pod vodstvom ministrovega svetovalca Boštjana Šefica,...
Celotna vsebina je na voljo le naročnikom.

Želite dostop do vseh spletnih vsebin?

Hiter nakup z mobilnim telefonom - Dnevni dostop 1,99 EUR
Za nakup dnevnega dostopa do vseh spletnih vsebin pošljite SMS s ključno besedo PN1 na številko 4246.
Plačilo z mobilnim telefonom je omogočeno pri operaterjih Telekom, A1, Telemach, T2 in Bob. Po izvedenem plačilu boste prejeli aktivacijsko kodo, ki jo vpišete v polje spodaj ali na prijavni strani. Nakup je enkraten in ga ne bomo samodejno obnavljali.
Že imate aktivacijsko SMS kodo?
Vpišite SMS kodo, ki ste jo prejeli po izvedenem plačilu. Po uspešnem vpisu, osvežite stran in uživajte v branju.  ALI

text:
The Mors deal failed
07 Nov 2019, 06:03 by Veronika Rupnik Female

Mayor Igor Marentic withdrew the controversial proposal for a new interim arrangement with the Ministry of Defense regarding the central military training ground from the agenda of yesterday's municipal council meeting. They will not support such an agreement, which would otherwise bring the municipality EUR 250,000 but would be harmful to the municipality in general, ...



Photo by Daniel Cek

POSTOJNA> Proposal for a new agreement prepared by the Morsa negotiation team with the municipality, led by Ministerial Advisor Boštjan Šefic, ...

Want access to all the online content?

Fast Mobile Phone Purchase - Daily Access $ 1.99
To purchase daily access to all online content, send an SMS with the keyword PN1 to 4246.
Payment by mobile phone is possible with the operators Telekom, A1, Telemach, T2 and Bob. After the payment is made, you will receive an activation code, which you enter in the box below or on the login page. The purchase is one off and we will not renew it automatically.
Already have an SMS activation code?
Enter the SMS code you received after making the payment. After successful enrollment, refresh the page and enjoy reading. BUT
